/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and shops, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the everyday hustle and bustle of city life.
